Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.api.index

Interface IndexProviderMap

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IndexConfigCompleter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultIndexProviderMap
    public interface IndexProviderMap
extends IndexConfigCompleter
    Contains mapping from IndexProviderDescriptor or provider name to IndexProvider.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static IndexProviderMap EMPTY  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void accept​(Consumer<IndexProvider> visitor)
      Visits all the IndexProvider with the visitor.
      IndexProvider getDefaultProvider()
      There's always a default IndexProvider, this method returns it.
      IndexProvider getFulltextProvider()
      The preferred IndexProvider for handling full-text indexes.
      IndexProvider lookup​(String providerDescriptorName)
      Looks up and returns the IndexProvider for the given index provider name.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.neo4j.internal.schema.IndexConfigCompleter

        completeConfiguration

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        static final IndexProviderMap EMPTY

    • Method Detail

      • lookup

        IndexProvider lookup​(IndexProviderDescriptor providerDescriptor)
              throws IndexProviderNotFoundException
        Looks up and returns the IndexProvider for the given IndexProviderDescriptor.
        Parameters:
        providerDescriptor - the descriptor identifying the IndexProvider.
        Returns:
        the IndexProvider with the given IndexProviderDescriptor.
        Throws:
        IndexProviderNotFoundException - if no such IndexProvider was found.

      • lookup

        IndexProvider lookup​(String providerDescriptorName)
              throws IndexProviderNotFoundException
        Looks up and returns the IndexProvider for the given index provider name. The name is what an IndexProviderDescriptor.name() call would return.
        Parameters:
        providerDescriptorName - the descriptor name identifying the IndexProvider.
        Returns:
        the IndexProvider with the given name.
        Throws:
        IndexProviderNotFoundException - if no such IndexProvider was found.

      • getDefaultProvider

        IndexProvider getDefaultProvider()
        There's always a default IndexProvider, this method returns it.
        Returns:
        the default index provider for this instance.

      • getFulltextProvider

        IndexProvider getFulltextProvider()
        The preferred IndexProvider for handling full-text indexes.
        Returns:
        the default or preferred index provider for full-text indexes.

      • accept

        void accept​(Consumer<IndexProvider> visitor)
        Visits all the IndexProvider with the visitor.
        Parameters:
        visitor - Consumer visiting all the index providers in this map.
